title: 'National Gallery' Offers A Lingering Look At Art
teaser: Filmmaker Frederick Wiseman's latest documentary takes audiences behind-the-scenes at London's National Gallery and delves into the stories being told in paintings. Wiseman tells NPR's Robert Siegel what he learned and how he goes about filmmaking.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
